text.div: Codesystem for the Class element based on IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFSm). This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through Non-patient File Sharing (NPFSm) Rev. 1.1

title.value: IHE Class Code set for use with Non-Patient File Sharing

description.value: Codesystem for the Class element based on IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFSm). This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Non-patient_File_Sharing_(NPFSm)
